message.body: What's going on in PHL? They're not even boarding our flight out of Phoenix because of a Philly ATC hold
On and off rain. Should be clear, or spotty, by the time you get in. I had much of the weekend at home alone. So I was a 14 year old and played with my rc truck
in the mud and construction sites.
Means the kids and I will tear down and rebuild some axles later. I am a huge nerd.
